content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's negotiate the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: While I find this modern and well-situated, I must be cautious with my expenses. I'm aiming for a very reasonable monthly cost.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand, but this is a premium apartment in the city center. A reasonable monthly cost for such an apartment would be around 1000 euros.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my budget is considerably lower due to my student status.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
